Blog.post: Hmm this is my first how you say.. blog? Well since right now I don't really have nothing to talk about, I'll just ramble non-stop! Sounds like fun huh everyone? Well isn't that what everyone does on this? That's what I think. So, does anyone like cows? I can draw a pretty neat drawing of em! I call it my mad cow! literally! not angry mad! but a crazy mad. when I get to my computer at my dad's house I can scan it on so everyone can enjoy my creation! Well acually I'm not sure if everyone will like it, but it's worth a shot right? I probly won't get any comments on this one, but maybe in the future I will, this will give me lots of stuff to do. Oh I got an idea! I'll tell everyone a little about myself! Sound good? Good! haha! Well I live in a small town in Alaska! Yea Alaska! And no! I don't live in igloos! My towns name is Valdez, one of the best fishing spots in the world! Or.. something like that! My name is Tabi, its pronounced like a Tabby Cat! Well my real name is Tabitha, but I don't like being called that! Because, well I'm a tomboy, aka I'm a girl that acts and dresses like a guy! I have blue eyes, well I wear contact inhancers so they make my eyes really blue! My natural hair color is.. well.. maybe all of you will have to guess that one! I'll post a pic if I can find one later! But a forewarning, my hair is dyed so its not my real hair color! I'm a little shorty, 5'1" blah! I hate being short! I do have a boyfriend his name is Devin. I have a brother, named Ren, he turns 18 on August 21st!! I'm currently 15 I turn 16 this year on Dec. 24th.. CHRISTMAS EVE!! Oh baby! HAHA! Drivers liscence here I come! I like to play guitar, I have a beat up old acustic, and a Flying V electic! Well, I'm not sure what else to put, except about my life, but I think I put enough info. and stuff on this one so I'll post more lata! But feel free to make comments on this here doodle, I'd like to meet more people/friends. Ok Ima gonna stop this here, so I'm done!
